title: Table 1011: additional affordable housing supply, detailed breakdown by local authority England

contacts.name: Miguel Marques dos Santos, MCHLG, SW1P 4DF

notes: The table presented here provides a more detailed breakdown of the types of unit contributing to overall supply for each individual local authority. Only difference with Tables 1006 to 1009: additional affordable homes provided by type of scheme and local authority, England is that the subset dimension of Dwelling - Completion-Starts On Site is further broken into, New Build and Rehab-Acquisition.
